title: The Levites Appointed for Service
summary: Numbers 3 outlines the duties of the Levites, who replaced the firstborn of Israel for service to God. The tribe of Levi is divided into the clans of Gershon, Kohath, and Merari, each with specific tabernacle responsibilities.

faq.question: What was the role of the Levites?
faq.answer: They cared for and transported the tabernacle and assisted the priests in worship duties.

faq.question: Why did God take the Levites in place of the firstborn?
